name: places/ChIJQZniF7RZwokRNFcWmLeDYPc
adrFormatAddress: 32 6th Ave, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: Working with Eyal to get into my new apartment was a fantastic process. Eyal went above and beyond to make my condominium application process as quick and efficient as possible. He was immensely timely in sending the board the application package, following up with me regularly with updates. He advocated for me and kept me in the loop in a very transparent and thoughtful way. He also worked with the owner of my new apartment to get me the keys to move in two days before my lease started and was very responsive with regard to a few issues that arose from the previous tenant. He is still involved, checking in on the status of my happiness with the unit and following up with the management company with any outstanding concerns. Eyal was professional since day one and has gone above and beyond.

originalText.text:
I was introduced to Eyal and The Zabari Team through a family friend, and I couldn't be more grateful for the recommendation. As a first-time home buyer, I embarked on the apartment search with enthusiasm but lacked the in-depth knowledge of the intricate process involved in acquiring an apartment in a co-op building. Working with Eyal over the past six months has been an exceptional experience. His attentiveness to my needs and genuine understanding of my preferences in a new home set the tone for a smooth journey. Throughout the complexities of the board package process, Eyal provided invaluable guidance, ultimately leading to the successful purchase of my dream apartment.

Eyal's responsiveness to my inquiries and unwavering commitment to my best interests were highly commendable. Possessing decades of experience in the real estate industry, his expertise was conspicuous at every juncture of the purchasing process. Particularly noteworthy was his adept handling of challenges, characterized by a pragmatic approach and a sense of urgency, resulting in expeditious and favorable resolutions. I was especially grateful for how Eyal advocated on my behalf on a daily basis to ensure all parties (seller's agent, management company, mortgage lender, etc.) were on track in order to facilitate a speedy closing.

I unequivocally endorse Eyal and The Zabari Team to individuals contemplating the acquisition or sale of residential properties in New York City. His professionalism, profound expertise, and unwavering dedication render the entire process not only navigable but also remarkably affirmative.

originalText.text:
We express our profound gratitude for the exceptional assistance provided by Eyal and The Zabari Team in facilitating the purchase of a new home for our son. We live in California and have limited knowledge of the complex process involved in acquiring a New York City co-op apartment. Eyal proved to be a dedicated real estate professional from the get-go. He developed an immediate rapport with us during our initial conversation and adhered to our timeline and requirements. He took the time to learn our son's preferences and promptly arranged several property visits that aligned with his needs. After just three appointments, our son identified a desirable apartment, and thanks to Eyal's remarkable negotiation skills, we secured an excellent price that was accepted by the seller.

Eyal's network of professionals enabled us to engage a reliable Mortgage Broker and Real Estate Attorney to facilitate the acquisition process for an NYC co-op apartment. The co-op board package process felt quite overwhelming and intimidating to first-time home buyers like us. However, Eyal helped us at every stage looking after our interests and promptly responded to all our inquiries. His decades of experience in the real estate industry was apparent as we went through the buying process. We were impressed by his ability to skillfully resolve any challenges that arose, approaching them pragmatically and with a sense of urgency, thereby ensuring swift resolutions.

Eyal went above and beyond our expectations who took genuine interest in every step of the co-op buying process. We wholeheartedly and enthusiastically endorse Eyal to anyone interested in purchasing a home in New York City.

The Bharadwajs

originalText.text:
Eyal was the agent for the apartment I purchased last December. Eyal was extremely helpful, open, transparent, and reliable through the whole process, he really cared about me, understood my needs from the very first open house even giving me ideas on how better utilize the space.

Eyal was always available to answer my questions and to show me the apartment any time I asked for. Highly recommend. Shoshana B,

originalText.text: Eyal just helped us purchase our first home and the experience could not have been better! As first time buyers, the process was initially overwhelming and daunting, but throughout every step of the process Eyal was available to promptly give thorough and knowledgeable answers to every question. His decades of experience are evident in his ready insight into all aspects of real estate, but what impressed us most was his ability to effectively problem solve any challenge that arose with a pragmatic approach and a sense of urgency towards resolution. Eyal's commitment to our best interests made the whole process seem personal and his consummate professionalism made what could have been a stressful process extremely manageable and smooth. We wholly and enthusiastically  recommend working with Eyal, as his expertise and professionalism are unparalleled!
